title: Tyger
excerpt: His limbs are knit, worn to bone with dignity / His flesh shriven / And wrested into conscious ghostly
fullText:
Tyger

His limbs are knit, worn to bone with dignity
His flesh shriven
And wrested into conscious ghostly
Form. In pained (fearful)
Symmetry cross'd and geometric drawn,
Sublime nighttime and orange furr'd
Fire imbued.
